summary: This document is a letter from the Internal Revenue Service informing Gratitude America Ltd of its approval for tax-exempt status under section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code. The letter outlines the organization's responsibilities and classification as a private foundation.

persons.name: Holly O. Paz
persons.role: Director, Exempt Organizations Rulings and Agreements
persons.context: Holly O. Paz is the signatory of the letter from the IRS, confirming the tax-exempt status of Gratitude America Ltd.

keyFacts: Gratitude America Ltd has been granted tax-exempt status under section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code.
Contributions to Gratitude America Ltd are deductible under section 170 of the Code.
Gratitude America Ltd is classified as a private foundation under section 509(a) of the Code.
The effective date of the exemption is April 25, 2012.
Gratitude America Ltd is required to file Form 990-PF annually.
